title: Track fault on Circle Line causing delays

updates.text: CCL] UPDATE: Free Bus boarding has ceased between #DhobyGhaut and #Promenade.

[CCL]UPDATE: Fault is cleared. Expect longer travelling time between #DhobyGhaut and #Promenade.
.
[CCL] UPDATE: Free Bus boarding are now available at affected stations between #DhobyGhaut and #Promenade.
[CCL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time between #DhobyGhaut and #Promenade in both directions due to track fault.
